A tome of clear thought was a magical book that contained exercises to supernaturally increase its readers intelligence.
Tomes of clear thought were heavy books that contained exercises designed to improve the readers memory and logical thinking. Contents of these tomes varied. Some contained a selection of esoteric and studious works of literature. Some works involved obscure mathematical or algebraic formulae, or even books that contained information on inter-planar biology.
Charged within the books words was a powerful magical enchantment. If the reader completed the book within a period of 6 days, an activity that required a total of 48 hours of reading, the reader was endowed with a substantial improvement to mental capacities, including the ability to further extend them beyond natural capabilities.
Once the book was fully read, it spent its magical power and became an ordinary book,. However, the book recharged its power after one century.
* The githyanki knight Alchaia, who led a detachment of githyanki inhabiting Stardock in the , owned a tome of clear thought and a manual of gainful exercise that she had falsely promised to share with her most accomplished soldiers.
* A copy of this book could be found among the magical books kept by the pharaoh Martek within his tomb.
* The book-obsessed lich Adzerak kept a tome inside his lair of Barrenstone.
